trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection" /> class is a read-only collection that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection" /> è una raccolta di sola lettura che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection> class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection> classe fa riferimento a Active Directory ADAM Application Mode () che è stato rinominato in Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> da cercare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> specificato è incluso in questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object is in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> è incluso nella raccolta. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="adamInstance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="adamInstance" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> che riceve gli elementi di questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>adamInstances</c> where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in <c>adamInstances</c> in corrispondenza del quale il metodo inizia a copiare questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> in questa raccolta nella matrice specificata, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The destination array is not large enough to hold the required number of elements.
trans-unit.target: La matrice di destinazione non è sufficientemente grande da contenere il numero di elementi necessari.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="adamInstances" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="adamInstances" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <paramref name="index" /> specificato non è compreso nell'intervallo della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> da cercare nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice della prima occorrenza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> specificato nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del primo oggetto corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce -1 se non sono presenti membri della raccolta identici all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="adamInstance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="adamInstance" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object to get.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> da ricevere.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> contenuto nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> object that exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="index" /> specificato non è compreso nell'intervallo dell'insieme.
